##Record data

```{r}
a <- c(2,4,3,8,5)
b <- c(3,4,7,6,9)

```

##Exploratory analysis

```{r}
plot(a,b)
```

##Improved graph

```{r}
plot(a,b, main = "My Scatterplot")
```

##Improved graph part 2

```{r}
plot(a,b,main = "My Scatterplot", xlab = "Pringles Eatten", ylab = "Happiness")
```

##Final Product

```{r}
plot(a,b,main = "My Scatterplot", xlab = "Pringles Eatten", ylab = "Happiness")
abline(lm(b~a))
```
